item.title: Dungeon RPG The Quintessential Princesses: Fantasy, the Abyss, and the Magic Academy announced for PS5, PS4, and Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/dungeon-rpg-the-quintessential-princesses-fantasy-the-abyss-and-the-magic-academy-announced-for-ps5-ps4-and-switch

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out on September 18 in Japan.

MAGES. has announced The Quintessential Princesses: Fantasy, the Abyss, and the Magic Academy, a dungeon RPG based on the manga and anime series The Quintessential Quintuplets. It will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on September 18 in Japan.

The game will be available in the following editions:

  • Physical and Digital (PlayStation 4 version is digital-only)
    • Standard Edition (8,690 yen)
      • The standard edition of the game
  • Physical (PlayStation 5 and Switch only)
    • Limited Edition (14,190 yen)
      • The standard edition of the game
      • Original anime Blu-ray disc – Contains the opening animation (including the creditless version) and a 10-minute original anime produced by the animation studio Seven Arcs, as well as a 45-minute visual drama in which Futaro and the quintuplets have a slumber party.
      • Special booklet (36 pages) – An art book containing setting materials for the original anime, as well as interviews with the voice actors and anime production staff.
      • Soundtrack (DVD-ROM) – A disc containing both WAV and MP3 data of background music from the game.
      • Limited edition box
    • Special Box (25,190 yen)
      • All of the content from the Limited Edition
      • Special sleeve case – A sleeve case that can store the original anime Blu-ray disc, mini script, and mini storyboard collection.
      • Mini script – The script for the original anime in a size that fits the Blu-ray disc case.
      • Mini Storyboard Collection – The storyboard for the original anime in a size that fits the Blu-ray disc case.
      • Blu-ray disc reversible jacket – An additional Blu-ray disc case jacket, so you can use the design of your choosing.
      • Acrylic stand (x5) – A limited edition acrylic stand of the quintuplets. The 150x100mm plates include a stand and nameplate in addition to the characters.
      • Tin badges (x6) – Limited edition tin badges of the quintuplets. Each are 56mm in diameter.
  • Digital
    • Digital Deluxe Edition (14,190 yen)
      • The standard edition of the game
      • Original anime – A digital app version of the original anime Blu-ray disc.
      • Special booklet – A digital app version of the special booklet.
      • Soundtrack – A digital app version of the soundtrack (DVD-ROM) included in the Limited Edition.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

About

This is a kingdom where science and magic coexist…

Futaro Uesugi, a poverty-stricken student at the Magic Academy, suddenly receives an offer for a well-paying part-time job as a private tutor.

His students turn out to be none other than his classmates, the quintuplets!

They’re the beautiful daughters of a wealthy noble that serves the royal family, but as Futaro is at the mercy of the five who “hate studying” and are “on the verge of failing,” he ends up learning the quintuplets’ “secret”…

Key Features

Your goal is to become the private tutor of five underperforming quintuplets on the verge of flunking out of the Magic Academy, and guide them toward graduation.

  • Story – Includes a main storyline set in the Magic Academy, along with individual character stories that spotlight each of the quintuplets.
  • Training – Raise each character’s stats, customize their magic wands, synthesize items, and more.
  • Quests and Battles – Accept quests and explore dungeons. Collect items, engage in battles, and use magic to defeat monsters.

As you develop each character and complete quests, new stories will unlock. What kind of school life awaits Futaro and the quintuplets?

item.title: Arashi Gaiden launches July 14
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/arashi-gaiden-launches-july-14

  • PC

Turn-based action game dated.

Turn-based action game Arashi Gaiden will launch for PC via Steam on July 14, publishers Nuntius Games and Vsoo Games, and developers Staera Studio and Wired Dreams Studio announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Arashi Gaiden is a turn-based action game, with frantic combat, in the dash and slash style, in which a ronin is hired by his former master, receiving the mission of recovering three powerful eastern relics, that the Matilha stole. This criminal organization joined a clan of Ninjas and is dominating the world of crime in Japan. This game is part of the same universe as Pocket Bravery, and expands the story of an important part of the game’s Japanese core.

You take on the role of Shinji Arashi, a ronin facing the problems of the past while facing some new enemies (and old acquaintances).

Key Features

  • Over five hours of fun in turn-based combat, with varied challenges, containing multiple solutions.
  • Make quick combos or plan combat calmly, the choice is yours.
  • A new level for an innovative combat system, Dash and Slash, enjoy turn-based combat with fast moves.
  • Fully handmade pixel art, with themed scenes from different locations in Japan.
  • Discover Arashi’s story and his involvement with Lobo.
  • Receive Power-Ups as you progress through the game, but manage them well during the match.
  • Enjoy a stylish turn-based action game with puzzle features (or vice versa).

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II sales top three million; Kingdom Come: Deliverance tops 10 million
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/kingdom-come-deliverance-ii-sales-top-three-million-kingdom-come-deliverance-tops-10-million

Total sales for Kingdom Come: Deliverance II have surpassed three million units, publisher Deep Silver and developer Warhorse Studios announced.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on February 4.

The game was last reported to have surpassed two million sales on February 17.

Total sales for the original Kingdom Come: Deliverance have now also surpassed 10 million units.

Here is an overview of the game, via Deep Silver:

About

Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is a thrilling action RPG, set amid the chaos of a civil war in 15th Century Bohemia.

You are Henry of Skalitz—an ordinary man doing extraordinary things—caught in a gripping tale of revenge, betrayal and discovery as he embarks on an epic journey, “from a humble blacksmith’s forge to the court of Kings,” as he searches for purpose in this beautiful but brutal medieval world.

From bustling city streets to lush forests, discover this open-world Medieval Europe through an unforgettable adventure filled with action, thrill and wonder.

Key Features

  • A Tale of Love and Revenge – Live life through the eyes and actions of Henry, a young man on a quest to avenge his murdered parents. His story—illustrated with over five hours of stunning cinematics—takes him from aspiring warrior to rebel, crossing paths with a charismatic cast of characters and an unforgettable set of adventures, as he goes up against the King of Hungary, Sigismund the Red Fox and his fearsome allies.
  • A True RPG Experience – Your actions shape Henry’s destiny and how the world will react to him. Customize freely his appearance, skills and equipment while taking a moral stance on the events around you. Travel round the land engaging in unique activities, such as blacksmithing and archery, to truly immerse yourself in this vibrant region of Europe that will remember your actions, forever.
  • Live a Life Medieval – This stunningly authentic rendition of 15th Century Bohemia allows you to experience this fascinating setting like never before. Get lost in a sprawling city, engage with peasants and talk with nobles while exploring a vast and rich countryside with taverns, bath houses, castles and more.
  • Authentic First-Person Combat – Feel the clash of steel and visceral combat as you engage in thrilling real-time battles. There’s a range of authentic weapons and combat styles to suit every player. On foot, horse or by stealth, you can specialize in elegant sword mastery, brutal blunt weapons or deadly ranged attacks.
